product_name: Overland Equipment Cambridge Convertible Tote - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: With hide-away backpack straps, adjustable tote straps and a padded laptop sleeve, the Overland Equipment Cambridge Convertible Tote is a work- and travel-friendly carrier for your computer and more. Zippered main compartment opens wide to allow access to padded and lined laptop sleeve that fits most laptop computers with screens up to 15.4 in. 2 oversized external pockets are designed to secure computer accessories, cords and other essentials. Hide-away padded backpack straps and adjustable tote straps offer versatile carrying options. Tough nylon construction provides long-lasting use. Closeout.
short_description: With hide-away backpack straps, adjustable tote straps and a padded laptop sleeve, the Overland Equipment Cambridge Convertible Tote is a work- and travel-friendly carrier for your computer and more.
